SamPy.astronomy.conversions.RAandDECfromStandardCoordinates¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.RAandDECfromStandardCoordinates(data)¶

Converts Standard Coordinates on tangent plane to RA and DEC on the sky. data dictionary must also contain the CD matrix. Full equations:

then

Parameters:
  • data (dictionary) – should contain standard coordinates X, Y, RA and DEC of the centre point, and the CD matrix.
Returns:

RA and DEC
Return type:

dictionary
